Message: Fix type of "ref" property on custom component
Description: The type of "ref" property on the class component always be a reference to an instance of a class component. But in react-pixi, it's a Pixi instance, so should set it to a function component and specify the type of ref property.
Message Abstract: Fix type of "ref" property on custom component
Description Abstract: The type of "ref" property on the class component always be a reference to an instance of a class component. But in react-pixi, it's a Pixi instance, so should set it to a function component and specify the type of ref property.
